message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $6,500. This is a competitive price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $5,800. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market price. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid $5,800 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $6,300. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $6,100. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $6,200. This is as low as I can go, considering the value the product will bring to your business. I hope this is a more acceptable price for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $5,900. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $6,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product will bring to your business. I hope this is a more acceptable price for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $5,800. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're not going to come to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to understand that this is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. I'll offer the product to you for $5,900. This is the absolute lowest price I can accept, considering the value the product will bring to your business. I hope this is a more acceptable price for you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $5,700. Can you consider this offer?
